website_summaries.verdict: Cute ceramic set including creamer, sugar bowl, and serving tray, one of 6 unique style variations by this manufacturer.
pros: Handy matching ceramic serving tray holds cream pitcher and sugar bowl
One of 6 in this manufacturer's Bistro Collection, which offers a variety of colors and styles
Attention to detail is apparent in designs, which are all charming
cons: A few complaints that set is too small, or that the pieces seemed to break easily

customer_reviews.title: Very very pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: I bought it in used condition and was sceptical but ooo my . It was well with it. It came so well packed nothing was broken or missing. Very very pleased with it . I love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought these!
customer_reviews.text: These look exactly as advertised, except the picture does not do them justice. These are absolutely beautiful! They are the perfect blend of rustic/sheik decor. I have been looking forever for a sugar/cream set that I actually like, and this did the trick. They are so nice they are on display, this will be one set that will not end up in the back of the cabinet. Great job!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Too fragile.
customer_reviews.text: The creamer handle is too fragile. It broke in my hand while rinsing it out. It was not dropped. It was way too expensive to be that poorly made
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Ingo

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: After spending some time in Ireland and having afternoon tea - I got home and missed it so much that I wanted my fancy afternoon tea time back! This is LOVELY. Beautiful quality and suitable for a prince or princess!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Cutest set ever!
customer_reviews.text: So cute next to my French press! Beautiful set. Unfortunately I scratched the creamer in the dishwasher, so I'll hand wash from now on. My own fault!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne M. Evola

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! I’m happy with it!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute! I was worried about ordering this set because some reviews said theirs came broken, and it was pricey. I took a chance and am glad I did. Mine was packed very well. I love the set and get tons of compliments!
customer_reviews.author: luvbug

customer_reviews.title: Do not stack well
customer_reviews.text: Really liked this item when I first got it since it was different. However, they don't stack well and eventually mine fell over a few times chipping easily and eventually shattering. Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a 3 tier tray I was designing. It worked perfectly
customer_reviews.author: cfg1119

customer_reviews.title: Break easily
customer_reviews.text: They are really pretty BUT they break easily!! I bought mine on Feb and two days ago while I was washing it, the handle just came off and dropped to the sink and broke into thousand of pieces. I barely use them so I think they are not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Betancourt

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price - don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: The set either didn’t come with or was missing the sugar spoon. And the set looks and feels cheap. I should have just returned it immediately for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Mary M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my coffee bar
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It has such a Rae Dunn feel. Could do without the piece of cardboard that says “serve” but I took it off.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Bakas

customer_reviews.title: Coffee bar approved
customer_reviews.text: Great set for my coffee bar. Super cute and was exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Kummer

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty but smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.text: The set is adorable but it’s a little smaller than I had envisioned
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Z.

customer_reviews.title: On the smaller side but perfect but what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: This is more of an off white versus a true white. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Must Have A "Second"
customer_reviews.text: Happy the Mud Pie Cream & Sugar set arrived in timely manner, but was very disappointed that printed "g" on sugar bowl, was marred. The letter appeared to be missing and then written in hap hazard. Lid also did not fit properly. The set was not listed as a "factory second, " but appeared so. Surprised the seller would risk reputation and send. This was to be a gift : ( Would not order from seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald L.

customer_reviews.title: beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These are so pretty but the creamer is light weight
customer_reviews.author: Dalene Gustkey

customer_reviews.title: creamer and sugar bowl
customer_reviews.text: It is very cute, but a lot smallerthan I had expected. Great quality
customer_reviews.author: laj

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and loved the style
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike about this item!! It has that little bit of farmhouse look I love. I actually love having a hot pot of tea and really like that this is all in one for carrying and placing on my coffee table. Not only is it cute but I received my item very quickly👍
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heat addiction my home!
customer_reviews.text: I have loved this addition next to my espresso machine. It was such a wonderful piece to have and beautiful for my family to enjoy coffee during the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Michele G.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Giving as part of a wedding shower gift. It is perfect..
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Graham

customer_reviews.title: Nice size, we’ll made and great looking.
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute! I get a lot of compliments. Perfect size and has its own little tray to keep it contained. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Whatcom

customer_reviews.title: Great condition, looks adorable
customer_reviews.text: I saw some bad reviews for this set, but I'm glad I took the risk and got it anyway. Came in perfect condition and there were no flaws at all. Perfect addition to my coffee bar.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but not well packaged
customer_reviews.text: Really cute set, but the Glass tray came broken... mom opened package on Christmas and was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Alysia

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: I really appreciate these two. So cute and the top knob is so adorable 😍
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Too small but cute!
customer_reviews.text: The spoon size is more appropriate for condiments. And the overall size of the sugar and creamer containers are much smaller than traditional sugar bowl or creamer. But it’s very cute!
customer_reviews.author: K. M.

customer_reviews.title: Fragile
customer_reviews.text: It is a very nice looking product however it is very fragile. The spoon fumbiled out of the wrapping and fell onto the floor and broke. so be very careful ad you dont want to drop any of there pieces as they will be break.
customer_reviews.author: GT

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay, just a little small.
customer_reviews.text: The whole set was a bit smaller than I had expected. It was a gift for my mom and she is already using it. I just wish the tray was a bit bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Monica C.

customer_reviews.title: Ok but broken tray
customer_reviews.text: Tray arrived broken. Thankfully Amazon provided prompt refund. I still have the creamer and sugar bowl and it's pretty cute, though the font seems crooked on one of them, not sure it was meant to be that way. Overall it's ok, doesn't really need the tray.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: High price for quality
customer_reviews.text: First time ordered came without lid second time bro tray and lid
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Cute set
customer_reviews.text: These are for my coffee bar...look great but disappointed about the sugar bowl the lid doesn’t fit well and doesn’t sit right on the bowl.
customer_reviews.author: J. Fields

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I wanted them for about a year and just finally purchased them. They’re very cute

customer_reviews.title: very fragile
customer_reviews.text: very cute! However i wash washing the soon and it broke in my hand. Hold very gently.

customer_reviews.title: cute and practical
customer_reviews.text: very nice set. Quality product, cute saying, and still pretty to look at.

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect and beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: This was absolutely the final touch our office needed. It’s perfect and absolutely beautiful! I recommend for gifts or even for the home and office!!

customer_reviews.title: Love Mud Pie!
customer_reviews.text: Love Mud Pie products and this set doesn’t disappoint! Very very cute!

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and I love the rustic antique look.
customer_reviews.text: I was on the fence about the color matching my kitchen decor but the undertone color is a very subtle brownish red.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a friend and she loves them. Has added more pieces to the collection.
customer_reviews.author: Mary N.

customer_reviews.title: if I knew it was so easily broken.
customer_reviews.text: The spoon broke when I washed it. The ceramic is very fragile. I would not buy this again, if I knew it was so easily broken.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Esser

customer_reviews.title: creamer and sugar bowl.
customer_reviews.text: It is so cute. It is a little smaller than I thought but perfect for tea or coffee with a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken Upon Arrival
customer_reviews.text: Despite being wrapped tightly in bubble wrap, the tray was broken upon arrival. There was also no spoon for the sugar. The jars are really cute though. Bummed I won’t be adding this to my diy Coffee nook.
customer_reviews.author: Chasity R.

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously small
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t read the dimensions, what a joke for “on sale” 25.00

customer_reviews.title: Spoon chips way too easily
customer_reviews.text: After a few uses the cute little spoon chipped in 3 places. I only hand washed it so pretty disappointed about that

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought it for my little coffee area
customer_reviews.text: This is soooo cute! So glad I bought it for my little coffee area.

customer_reviews.title: PUSHASE DOESN'T  MEET EXPECTATION
customer_reviews.text: Looks more like a cream and sugur dish for a kids tea party .Also the wood crate was flimsy and the bottem was broke not worth the money not happy with purchase

customer_reviews.title: THEY ARE PRECIOUS
customer_reviews.text: They are so cute and absolutely perfect to complete my coffee bar.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: “&” Sign not included
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting the “&” sign to come with the set, but it did not. Very disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: Not that impressive!
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for a larger and more user friendly sugar and creamer set.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are cute, but a bit smaller that I thought they would be.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to receive it. When I open it I was definitely disappointed. It was so small, that it looked like a child’s toy
customer_reviews.author: irma chavez

customer_reviews.title: Sugar Clumps!
customer_reviews.text: I think the set is adorable. Looks great in my coffee center, however the sugar clumps because of the spoon opening. I have to fill a teabag with rice and keep it in the sugar bowl for every day use. Wish I had know.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: This is a sweet and classy looking cream & sugar set.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Small but very cute
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of the item but it was a little small
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Elegant with a rustic flare
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised. Both look amazing and much more expensive than the actual price. I’m actually looking at their site right now for additional items to go with them.

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set but it was a little smaller than I thought .
customer_reviews.author: Kwilban

customer_reviews.title: So adorable
customer_reviews.text: Just beautiful love it .. it looks so chic in your kitchen.. it was a great addition for my coffe bar

customer_reviews.title: SO Cute!  Great Size
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS SET. It is a good size and so cute!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: I will keep the set but I am not happy about it
customer_reviews.text: This set is a prime example of "appearance over functionality". I have no comments over "Sugar" but my main issue is with "Cream" cup. True, it is aesthetically pleasing and it functions as intended. At the same time, I am yet to figure out a way to pour milk without spilling a few drops. It happens every single time. I will keep the set but I am not happy about it. P.S. You can microwave it for 30-60 seconds with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: love it! it is a very cute set
customer_reviews.text: love it! it is a very cute set. just as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Smith

customer_reviews.title: Adorable but doesn’t stack
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited about this item as I redid my kitchen in white French farmhouse. When it arrived I saw that it is absolutely adorable, but it is not made to stack- at least mine isn’t. :( If I stacked it like it is in the picture the top would surely fall off- the pieces don’t fit together. (That was why I bought it- because it stacked) I can still use it of course, but may return.
customer_reviews.author: M.P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: SOOO blooming cute. Almost tooo cute to use! I don’t want to ruin them
customer_reviews.author: Misty Connaughton

customer_reviews.title: Nice set. I keep it on my dining table ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice set. I keep it on my dining table all the time. Ceramic is solid, and the rusty look of handles on tray adds little extra. My only complaint is the milk container does not fit properly on the tray, the diameter of the bottom of cup is slightly more than the flat portion of the tray. So the cup is sort of balanced on the slope of tray making it unsteady ... It's too bad for otherwise perfect item.
customer_reviews.author: speed8

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So excited to have this on my coffee station! 🤗

customer_reviews.title: I love it! Arrived perfectly cannot wait to use them
customer_reviews.text: I love it ! Arrived perfectly cannot wait to use them

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!  Looks great I  my kitchen!!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful and practical. I don't use sweeteners so I put bagged tea I the sweetener holder. Love this set!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ron VanCleve Jr

customer_reviews.title: Love this set
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for something to use when I had company over. Very cute!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my tea set! Mud Pie, you rock!! Keep these items coming...

customer_reviews.title: Cute Accent for Party or Kutchen
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for both of my daughters-in-law and they loved the set!
customer_reviews.author: Rednan

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good. The lid for the sugar bowl does ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good. The lid for the sugar bowl does not fit well, but that sorta fits in with the 'soft' shapes of the item. The 'serve' tag is sturdier than it looks. Still didn't stop me from throwing it in the garbage. Kinda stupid attachment that needlessly adds to the price IMO. Item was VERY well packaged in form-fitting foam, if yours arrives broken you are very unlucky..
customer_reviews.author: dgh1

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly like the picture will be perfect for my coffee bar!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SPOOK BROKE
customer_reviews.text: The sugar spoon broke into my full coffee cup while I was putting sugar in my coffee. Can I get a replacement spoon???
customer_reviews.author: Max and Tut

customer_reviews.title: Sad beginning
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute set and I was so excited I splurged on buying it. When I opened it, the lid fell off the sugar container and broke on the floor. FIRST THING!! So sad. I couldn't figure out how to get ahold of the sellers to tell them and beg for a replacement. That lid is one of my favorite things about it. No stale sugar!!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie S.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this set yesterday and it's perfect! Looks great with my kitchen colors. Fast shipping and was packed in tons of styrofoam so there was no chance of breaking. Super cute and I can't wait to use it!
customer_reviews.author: J. Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect! Arrived safely and seller made sure items were secure to insure they weren't broken. Love this set!!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Ray

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete Set
customer_reviews.text: Mud Pie of course is a very good product. I ordered this after seeing my friend's. However, it wasn't until I compared my Mud Pie to hers that I realized that the center piece was milling as well as Cute brown tag that said SERVE that was tied to the tray. I do realize the product I purchased - picture (very small) is represented - it is still wrong to sell a product that is not sold in a gift store! I will not be using anything "mudpie" again. I purchased a "Ray Dunn" sugar and creamer in a gift store that by looking knew it would be the product I was buying.
customer_reviews.author: Karenmc

customer_reviews.title: Very unique and looks great on our little coffee bar!
customer_reviews.text: Glad to get this set again - my husband broke the sugar bowl - and yes with all the sugar in it- I looked long and hard and loved the set and this was the only place I could find it so I’m very happy! This time I had to pay quite a bit more for it though but it’s worth it to me to have it back.
customer_reviews.author: Donovan1

customer_reviews.title: I waited to buy this for 3 years and LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: It came as beautifully as I had hoped. It’s rustic in a way that leaves the pieces a little wobbly on the tray but just slightly and there are a few little imperfections in the ceramic but in line with the style. Totally recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Briscomes

customer_reviews.title: Love the glam touch!
customer_reviews.text: I love the MudPie products. This set is even prettier in person. The crystal knob takes the look up from casual to fancy. Both containers are a good size and weight. I will enjoy having this set on my counter.
customer_reviews.author: PEPPERANN

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful next to coffee pot
customer_reviews.text: I feel these were more expensive than what they are worth as the spoon is not very durable. If you're not careful then it will bend. Otherwise, I really like these bowls. They are the perfect size for sugar and cream next to the coffee pot.
customer_reviews.author: Billy G.

customer_reviews.title: Cute little set well worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This item is adorable and matches a really cute cookie jar that I Have. It’s not too. If and not too small just perfect and I like the tray that comes with it. It makes it easy to move around my kitchen as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Diana E palumbo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set! Highly recommend!!!🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟
customer_reviews.text: Love this set. Goes great with all my Rae Dunn collection and looks fabulous on my table. Perfect size and the serving tray that it came on is fantastic for all sorts of things! That's perfect in itself!! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Bellabahlou

customer_reviews.title: Great for adding character to your coffee pot.
customer_reviews.text: Saw this in a great little store in Wildwood MO, only had one which my sister in law bought - so I searched Amazon for one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Meh - cute design,  poor craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: The first order I received was broken in in several places - was wrapped in one thin layer of bubble wrap the only packing. The replacement order was sent fast but sugar bowl’s lid does not fit the top, allowing for moisture to cause clumping, so it is useless.
customer_reviews.author: ThosPaine

customer_reviews.title: Cracked
customer_reviews.text: The sugar is cracked right out of packaging. Due to virus right now won’t be able to return item.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!

customer_reviews.title: Cute as it can be...and functional!

customer_reviews.title: Look super cute I just don't imagine these lasting long once ...
customer_reviews.text: Ceramic is very fragile. Look super cute I just don't imagine these lasting long once someone tips it over! :(

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

product_meta.title: Mud Pie Circa Cream and Sugar Set
product_meta.description: Color:CircaOur stackable Circa cream and sugar set is an easy way for your guests to customize their coffee at your next get together. This set is 3.75” in diameter and includes a 2.5” tall container for milk or creamer and a 2” tall sugar holder. “Lighten up” and “Sweeten it” sentiments clearly identify customization options. Lid is custom designed with a cut out for our 5” silver-plated spoon with “gimme sugar” sentiment
feature_bullets: Our stackable Circa cream and sugar set is an easy way for your guests to customize their coffee at your next get together.
This set is 3.75” in diameter and includes a 2.5” tall container for milk or creamer and a 2” tall sugar holder
“Lighten up” and “Sweeten it” sentiments clearly identify customization options.
Lid is custom designed with a cut out for our 5” silver-plated spoon with “gimme sugar” sentiment

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars370 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
